DataElement.preferredName: Recovery And Maintenance Neutrophil Count 500 Post Declining Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter was recovered and maintained following a decline.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Recovery And Maintenance Neutrophil Count 500 Post Declining Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep._Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Becoming progressively lower, growing weaker, or going from better to worse._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury.:An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence.:The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep.:Indicates a neutrophil count of at least 500 per cubic millimeter.

An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
